pkgmetadata.longdescription: Color Palettes for Mycobacterium Tuberculosis Data Visualization // Colour palettes and helper functions for visualising Mycobacterium tuberculosis genomic and epidemiological data with 'ggplot2' and 'ggtree'. The package provides predefined palettes, scale functions, tree/cladogram helpers, and convenient preview tools to ensure consistent branding in pathogen-omics visualisations. The palettes were developed as part of the 'mycolorsTB' project https://github.com/PathoGenOmics-Lab/mycolorsTB.
